# Codiner Community Templates

> A comprehensive collection of 22+ production-ready templates for modern web development

This repository contains production-ready templates for various frameworks and technologies:

## üöÄ Quick Start

```bash
git clone https://github.com/Subhan-Haider/Codiner-Template.git
cd Codiner-Template
cp -r community-templates/[template-name] my-project
cd my-project
npm install && npm run dev
```

## üìÅ Available Templates

### Web Frameworks (11)
- **React Official** - Advanced React with SEO, accessibility & performance tools
- **Next.js Official** - Full-stack Next.js with modern features
- **Vue 3 + TypeScript** - Vue 3 with Composition API
- **Nuxt 3** - Full-stack Vue.js framework
- **SvelteKit** - SvelteKit 2.0 with Svelte 5
- **SolidJS** - Reactive framework for performance
- **Qwik** - Instant-loading applications
- **Angular** - Enterprise Angular application
- **Astro Multi-Framework** - Multi-framework static sites
- **Remix + React** - Modern full-stack React
- **React Router 7** - File-based routing

### APIs & Backend (3)
- **Express.js API** - Lightweight Node.js API
- **NestJS API** - Enterprise-grade API
- **Fastify API** - High-performance API

### Desktop Apps (2)
- **Tauri + React** - Secure desktop apps with Rust
- **Electron + Svelte** - Traditional desktop apps

### Mobile & Cross-Platform (2)
- **Capacitor + Vue** - Cross-platform mobile
- **React Native + Expo** - Universal React Native

### Specialized (4)
- **Portal Mini Store** - E-commerce platform with CMS
- **Docker + Next.js** - Containerized applications
- **Chrome Extension** - Browser extensions
- **Bun Runtime** - Next-gen JavaScript runtime
